name: Mecki - Winter Hibernation
description:
A game by Team Moritz 2022

{with special thanks to  thEpOpE  and Mike van der Lee  for additional code!}

Based on the vintage German children's TV show Mecki dating back to the 1950s with characters created by Paul, Ferdinand &  Hermann Diehl

Help Mecki the hedgehog navigate through 6 perilous areas to reach the old man of the woods house and find a comfy bed for the winter.

Spray the baddies with his never ending supply of fleas and reach the sheep guide at the end of each level.

Its as simple (and wacky) as that.

Just a Walk in the park !

Travel through:

The park

The busy road

The rat house

The Sinclair house

Sleepyville

A bed for Winter Hibernation

Features different music on the 48k and 128k versions with the ingame AY music also playing on a 48k machine (if ZX AY card is attached)

To force the 48k version on a 128k machine either load in 48k mode or press 's' when first loading on a DIVMMC device.

Keys:

Q - UP

A - DOWN

O - LEFT

P - RIGHT

Space/M - spray fleas

G/H - Ingame music/extra SFX ON/OFF  

 

Joystick:

Interface 2 compatible

Go Mecki !
